member.name: M:Boongaloo.API.Controllers.GroupsController.Get(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Returns all the groups that contain this point(lat/lon) as part of their diameter

member.name: M:Boongaloo.API.Controllers.GroupsController.Post(Boongaloo.Repository.Entities.Group)
member.summary: Creates a new group centered with the coordinates that were passed.

member.name: M:Boongaloo.API.Controllers.GroupsController.Get(System.Int32)
member.summary: Extracts specific group by its id.
